data.actual_result: your name shows in the vc tab but can't speak, hear, leave or join it back
data.expected_result: should be able to join the same vc back
data.short_description: cannot join back vc after the app stops functioning while playing a game
data.steps_to_repro: - Join vc with other people and talk with them - close discord app - open a game - play it till you stop hearing voices of other people - remove discord from multitasking - try to join the same vc back
